TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 帮助读取配置文件的 节，并帮助创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Assists in reading in the section of a configuration file and creating an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和相应``.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用配置节。The class and the corresponding `` configuration section have been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 用于管理浏览器功能的首选的方法是通过以供进行编译的浏览器定义文件类。The preferred method for managing browser capabilities is through browser definition files that are compiled for use by the class. 这两种配置方法的目标是生成的实例类可以从访问属性的类。The goal of both configuration methodologies is to generate an instance of the class that can be accessed from the property of the class. 使用浏览器定义文件来存储浏览器功能提供了优于替代方法。Using the browser definition files to store browser capabilities affords advantages over the alternative. 它提供改进的性能，因为浏览器定义信息是从 XML 配置文件分析并编译为提前类。It offers improved performance because the browser definition information is parsed from the XML configuration file and compiled into a class ahead of time. 浏览器定义文件也是更易于维护的：The browser definition files are also easier to maintain: - 定义是分层的因此依赖于减少对正则表达式来确定浏览器功能。The definitions are hierarchical, and thus rely less on regular expressions to determine the browser capabilities. - 定义可以组织在多个文件，使它们更易于管理。The definitions can be organized in multiple files, making them easier to manage. - 定义可以在任何级别，在 Machine.config 级别或特定的应用程序级别定义。The definitions can be defined at any level, either at the Machine.config level or a specific application level. 这消除了需要复制整个组用于重写特定浏览器的功能的定义。This eliminates the need to copy the entire set of definitions for the purpose of overriding the capabilities for a specific browser.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件和浏览器功能

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls and Browser Capabilities

param.span: 配置文件中包含信息的节。

summary.span: 创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

span.span: An instance of that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类派生从其浏览器定义数据``配置节。This class derives its browser definition data from the `` configuration section. 本部分.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用。This section is deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
